name: BASE WORKSHOP. Building With BASE - Agent Edition.
description:
This is a continuation of the Build with Base series. Continuing from where we stopped last year, builders are invited to attend this workshop to explore onchain autonomous agents.

In an era where we strive to automate literally everything, there has been no better time to decentralize autonomy than now. Autonomous agents not only have taken the world by storm but have also impacted our onchain interactions. What better way can we harness their power than to build and explore with our own...!

Agenda.

Learning Basics about AI Autonomous agents

Build a simple Agent.

Learn to use the Agent Kit with other integrations.

As a cherry on top, we are gonna have a fun filled learning experience with merch and refreshments after, Agents are supposed to be fun afterall...see you there. The event is supported by Base and organized by Joel Ategyeka.

About Base

Base, incubated within Coinbase, is an Ethereum Layer 2 (L2) network offering a secure, low-cost, developer-friendly way to build decentralized apps onchain. Base aims to be decentralized, permissionless, and open to anyone. We believe onchain is the next online, and aim to empower developers to shape the onchain future.

Learn more about Base at base.org and about Coinbase at coinbase.com

**Disclaimer: Please note that photographs and footage will be taken throughout the event and will be used for marketing and publicity, on our website, blog and in social media or in any third party publication.
